full_summary:
**Maintenance and Repair of Gym Equipment in the National Capital Region (NCR)**

**Notice ID:** PW-23-01021355
**Solicitation Number:** 202301764/B
**Date Published:** January 13, 2023
**Closing Date:** February 10, 2023 02:00:00 PM EST

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Overview**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide maintenance and repair services for gym equipment located in various gymnasiums in the National Capital Region (NCR). The successful contractor will be responsible for providing preventive maintenance, inspection, lubrication, and interior cleaning services on a monthly basis, as well as repair services on an as-needed basis.

**Scope of Work**

The contractor will be required to provide services at three fitness facilities located in the NCR:

* Two main facilities: Leikin building - 73 Leikin Drive (new RCMP HQ) and Nicholson building - 1200 Vanier Parkway
* One smaller facility: Air Services - 2000 Research Road

The estimated time required to complete the work is approximately 16 hours per month.

**Contract Period**

The contract period will be for one year from the date of contract award, with an option to extend for up to four additional one-year periods.

**Key Dates**

* Closing date: February 10, 2023
* Anticipated start date: April 1, 2023
* Deliverables due date: March 31, 2024

**Security Requirements**

This contract requires the contractor to meet certain security requirements, as outlined in the RFP document.

**Evaluation and Selection Criteria**

The contractor will be evaluated based on the lowest evaluated price.

**Tender Documents**

The RFP document, including technical specifications and terms and conditions, is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/13/5c94694768b48aa569c0675dd9c742b3/202301764b_-_rfp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/13/5c94694768b48aa569c0675dd9c742b3/202301764b_-_rfp_en.pdf).

**Inquiries and Submissions**

For general inquiries and submissions, please contact Suparna Sarker at Suparna
